docs.snippet: Latin-American loans under negotiation and there which are likely to be discussed with American bankers aggregate $667,685,000, according to a survey made by Dr. Max Winkler. Vice president of Bertron, Griscom  Co.
docs.lead_paragraph: Latin-American loans under negotiation and there which are likely to be discussed with American bankers aggregate $667,685,000, according to a survey made by Dr. Max Winkler. Vice president of Bertron, Griscom Co.

headline.main: BIG LOAN PROGRAM FOR LATIN AMERICA; $667,685,000 Total to Be Discussed With Bankers Here,Says Dr. Winkler.ONLY SMALL PART SOONArgentina's Needy Put at $464,000,000, Brazil's at $93,500,000, Chile's at $62,185,000. Large Brazilian Loans Likely Colombian Loan Requirements. BIG LOAN PROGRAM FOR LATIN AMERICA Subway in Argentina.

docs.abstract: Uruguay appts overseers to supervise transfer of captured forts; Paraguay notifies Uruguay that L F Gauchalla, Bolivia's designee as Min to Paraguay, is acceptable

headline.main: OVERSEERS NAMED IN CHACO EXCHANGE; Uruguay Appoints Two Majors to Supervise the Transfer of Captured Forts. PAIR MAY GO END OF WEEK Paraguay Notifies Montevideo That Bolivia's Designee as Minister at Asuncion Is Acceptable.

byline.original: Special Cable to THE NEW YORK TIMES

docs.snippet: The American Teleprione ann Telegraph Company is expected to give in the coming Summer rights worth $301,000,000 to the 475,000 holders of 14,000,000 shares, permitting the purchase of one new share at $100 for each seven held, giving the company an...
docs.lead_paragraph: The American Teleprione ann Telegraph Company is expected to give in the coming Summer rights worth $301,000,000 to the 475,000 holders of 14,000,000 shares, permitting the purchase of one new share at $100 for each seven held, giving the company an additional capital of $200,000,000.

headline.main: $301,000,000 RIGHTS BY A.T. & T. LIKELY; Offering of One New Share at $100 for Each Seven Held Expected Soon. NET LOWER FOR QUARTER Drop of $60,910 From Previous Year Follows Larger Fixed Charges --$2.95 a Share Earned. Decline for Quarter Shown. Lower Stock Conversion Value. Larger Fixed Charges.

docs.lead_paragraph: The Hakoah eleven defeated a selected team by 3 to 2 at Starlight Park yesterday in the first of the trial games, from which the United States Football Association, under the direction of Colonel G. headline.main: HAKOAH IS WINNER IN TEST SOCCER, 3-2; Beats Picked Eleven in Trial to Select Team for World's Title Play in Uruguay.
